ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'That will clearly be a losing restoration!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They say: "Then this returning will be a dead loss."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They say: “That will then be a return with a great loss!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They have said, "Such a resurrection will certainly be a great loss".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “So this return is an obvious loss!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They say: "It would in that case, be a return with loss!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: That then would be a return occasioning loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They shall say, 'That then were a losing return!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They say: Then that would be a vain proceeding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and they say, "That indeed would be a losing return."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They say: that then shall be a losing return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will say, ‘This is, then, a ruinous return!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They say: "It would, in that case, be a return with loss!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They say: "It would in that case, be a return with loss!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will say: 'Then we are returned lost'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They say, “This is a losing proposition.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:12] They will say, ‘That, return of ours to life, then, if it were true, would be a ruinous return!’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: The Prophet (pbuh) said to them: "Indeed, Allah will raise you again from the dead". (They say: Then that would be a vain proceeding) that would be a failed attempt, because it will never happen.
